item.title: Fixed: oDesk API OAuth throwing a strict standard
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
Just wanted to share this quick fix for oDesk API OAuth type.

 

Strict Standards: Non-static method oDeskAPI::transcode() should not be called statically in {PATH}\oDeskAPI.oauth.php on line 473

I have attached a quick fix below:

https://gist.github.com/4318238
item.excerpt:encoded: Just wanted to share this quick fix for oDesk API OAuth type. Strict Standards: Non-static method oDeskAPI::transcode() should not be called statically in {PATH}\oDeskAPI.oauth.php on line 473 I have attached a quick fix below:

item.title: oDesk job feed - wordpress plugin
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
oDesk_job_feed installation instructions

oDesk job feed let you see the latest jobs posted on oDesk.

How to install:

Download oDesk_Job_Feed.zip

Install plugin by uploading on your wordpress plugin page; or extract to your plugin directory.

Activate plugin

How to use:

[oDeskFeed][/oDeskFeed] - default tag

[oDeskFeed cat=1][/oDeskFeed] - display jobs feed from "Software Development" category

Categories:

0 => Web Development

1 => Software Development

2 => Networking and Information System

3 => Customer Service

4 => Business Services

5 => Administrative Support and Data Entry

6 => Writing Translation

7 => Administrative Support

8 => Design and Multimedia

9 => Sales Marketing

 

Download this plugin at https://github.com/mvcejas/oDesk_job_feed

Direct link: https://github.com/mvcejas/oDesk_job_feed/archive/master.zip
item.excerpt:encoded: oDesk_job_feed installation instructions oDesk job feed let you see the latest jobs posted on oDesk. How to install: Download oDesk_Job_Feed.zip Install plugin by uploading on your wordpress plugin page; or extract to your plugin directory. Activa...

item.title: Google Map v3 new function prototype
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
Google Map API has new function in getting the location data. One of this function is when getting the Latitude and Longitude which is now using the following:

geo.geocode({'address':Address},function(result,status){ if(status=='OK'){ var pos = result[0].geometry.location; console.log(pos.lat()); console.log(pos.lng()); } });

Did you notice the new function lat() and lng() rather than before using object Xa & Ya?

This update had effected around October 2012, I think??

item.title: Welcome to my new blog site, my official blog site.
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
Starting this date, I am creating new blog on this space and this will be my official blog site. Here, I will keep any of my new updates and latest activities coming into my life. So, this is all! 

Thanks for visiting and keep following me!

item.title: oDesk beta site is live! What do you think?
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
oDeskers are getting a first peek at the new beta site.

The updated design will help you read, navigate, and take care of business easier than ever. But it’s more than just a pretty face! Under the surface there’s a major code overhaul, making the site quicker and more consistent. Even better, oDesk can roll out new functionality and fix problems fast.

New capabilities are coming your way faster than ever before, including:

  • A new My Contractors page that lets you track your current team, as well as past hires and saved contractors
  • Message Center updates with upcoming fixes to address issues you've shared with us
  • More powerful search and Job Feeds to help you find the jobs and contractors you want

To access the new site:

Log into oDesk and look for the “Try the New Site!” link at the top of every page or if you are not a beta tester try putting this in to your browser address https://www.odesk.com/beta/opt-in. Give it a try! if you want to go back to the old site just put this to your address bar https://www.odesk.com/beta/opt-out and go!

To leave your feedback:

http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/Z9DLFHK

item.title: Web scraper
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
Recently, I got a project from fiverr to write a PHP script that scrape data from a site.

function scrapeData($url){ $ch = curl_init(); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HEADER, 0); curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1); $data = curl_exec($ch); $status = curl_getinfo($ch,CURLINFO_HTTP_CODE); curl_close($ch); if($status==200){ $x = new SimpleXMLElement($data,LIBXML_NOCDATA); // initiliaze to its corresponding variables $Kategorie = $x->Product->Category->Name['Value']; $Hersteller = $x->Product->Supplier['Name']; $Artikelnummer = $x->Product['Prod_id']; $Bezeichnung = $x->Product['Name']; $EAN = $x->Product->EANCode['EAN']; $UPC = $EAN; $Beschreibung = $x->Product->ProductDescription['LongDesc']; $Technische_Daten = $x->Product->SummaryDescription->LongSummaryDescription; $Sprache = $x->Product->ProductFeature['59']['Value']; $URL = $x->Product->ProductDescription['URL']; $Marktrelease = $x->Product['ReleaseDate']; $Bild = $x->Product['HighPic']; $file_header = array( 'Kategorie', 'Hersteller', 'Artikelnummer', 'Bezeichnung', 'EAN', 'UPC', 'Beschreibung', 'Technische_Daten', 'Sprache', 'URL', 'Marktrelease', 'Bild'); $file_content = array( $Kategorie, $Hersteller, $Artikelnummer, $Bezeichnung, $EAN, $UPC, $Beschreibung, $Technische_Daten, $Sprache, $URL, $Marktrelease, $Bild); array_push($_SESSION['COMPLETE_DATA'],$file_content); // INIT VARS $DriveSave = false; $DBSave = true; $path = '.'; if($DriveSave){ /* enable $DriveSave = true if you want to save it on your drive */ $fp = fopen($path."scrape_".time().".csv","w"); fputcsv($fp, $file_header); fputcsv($fp, $file_content); fclose($fp); } if($DBSave){ /* enable $DBSave = true if you want to save this on your db */ /* Please set your database connection here */ define('DB_HOST','localhost'); define('DB_USER','User_0001'); define('DB_PASS','testingit'); define('DB_NAME','scrapeit'); $sql = new mysqli(DB_HOST,DB_USER,DB_PASS,DB_NAME); $stmt = $sql->prepare("INSERT INTO scrape( Kategorie, Hersteller, Artikelnummer, Bezeichnung, EAN, UPC, Beschreibung, Technische_Daten, Sprache, URL, Marktrelease, Bild) VALUES('?','?','?','?','?','?','?','?','?','?','?','?')"); $stmt->bind_param('ssssssssssss', $Kategorie, $Hersteller, $Artikelnummer, $Bezeichnung, $EAN, $UPC, $Beschreibung, $Technische_Daten, $Sprache, $URL, $Marktrelease, $Bild); $stmt->execute(); } return json_encode(array( 'status'=>true, 'data'=>'Completed. Data saved.' ) ); } else{ return json_encode(array( 'status'=>false, 'data'=>'Error: HTTP return '.$status ) ); } }

You can fork it here https://github.com/mvcejas/web-scraper

item.title: Bohol Island State University Poll System
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
To those students interested continuing developing this program for Bohol Island State University Election System this is your chance to get a copy of the source code.


Software: Visual Basic Express 2005

Database: MySQL any version

You need to install atleast .NET 2.0

If you need the following above softwares. You can request a copy by leaving your comments below.
To download .NET 2.0 you can visit microsoft.com or try the address below:
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=16614

Download Bohol Island State University Automated Election System now!

*NOTE: To request the full source code please leave your comment below, please don't forget to indicate your purpose.

item.title: Removing your shortcut icon on Windows 7
item.dc:creator: Mar Cejas
item.content:encoded:
Actually, this is not removing the shortcut icon but rather we are making it transparent icon instead of the arrow icon. 

How we do it, is we need to access it on registry using regedit command on command prompt. Once we are on the registry, we need to find the following keys:

  • HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE
  • SOFTWARE
  • Microsoft
  • Windows
  • CurrentVersion
  • Explorer
  • Shell Icons (This key is not created on default Windows 7 registry, so we need to create this manually by doing a right-click and create new key)

Once, we have created the Shell Icons key, we need then create a new String Value with the following Name: 29 and Data: %SystemRoot%\System32\imageres.dll,113

Logoff your computer and then see the cleaner shortcut icons on your desktop.

Note: Sometimes the shortcut icon turn black, I think problem hooking up from the icon library, not sure, maybe someone can comment why this is happening. So, another option is to create a transparent icon and hook them up as your new Data value.
